Topic.Title: How do I call to the players alias?

Posts.EditableText: I allowed the player to set their own alias, but now I need to be able to call to the alias they set. how do I do this?
Posts.HTML: I allowed the player to set their own alias, but now I need to be able to call to the alias they set. how do I do this?

Posts.EditableText:
if you want them to see or call their name use 

```
msg ("Your name is " + player.alias + ".")
```
All this is, is a Print Message use expression then the rest is their.
